website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, easy-to-stow grill makes grilling anywhere possible.
pros: Foldable design can be carried and transported using one hand
Grill size can cook food for up to 6 people
Cleanup is easy due to included grease tray
cons: The smaller grill is not suggested for big parties or for gatherings

customer_reviews.title: The worst part, in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This grill is cheaply made, which one should expect for the price tag. The worst part, in my opinion, is the grill grate itself. Its made out of stamped steel, meaning it is thin, and it is coated with porcelain. The porcelain coating easily flakes off, which is unacceptable, even for the price tag. Thinking that maybe I got a dud or abused my grill, I returned it and had the exact same thing happen on the second one within about 2 weeks. I would not recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Functional and inexpensive, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Coleman Fold-N-Go BBQ. I rolled my previous one after 3 years of use. I select this specifically due to its relatively compact size, to fit in the storage area of my Sprinter class B RV. It’s not a high quality grill, made of stamped metal. The latch mechanism does not connect or latch properly. But, for a $49 BBQ, I overlook the deficiencies. It does, however, BBQs well! I store it in a heavy duty recyclable Trader Joe’s shopping bag. Perfect for tight storage.
customer_reviews.author: --SJ

customer_reviews.title: It is in reality far better than OK
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, I assumed this grill would be simply OK, 2, maybe 3 stars. It is in reality far better than OK. VERY even cooking, small and compact size, ideal for our camper, pretty efficient too. It cooks quickly, almost too quickly if you aren't paying attention, I assume because of it's rather shallow vertical dimensions. Thick burgers, steak or chicken breast are no problem. A bottle of propane lasts a long time. I'm quite impressed. I wish there were 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: hempomatic

customer_reviews.title: Dear Coleman
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for such a great grill. I'm a 62 year old handicapped female and I was able to assemble this quickly. TIP: Use a magnetic Phillips screwdriver. Very tiny screws. I do have a concern. When I went to light it I couldn't see any flame ignite but I could feel it heating quick. I never could see the flame the whole time I was cooking but it cooked it to perfection in 5 minutes. I highly recommend this to seniors that don't need a big grill.
customer_reviews.author: The Dog ZooTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little grill for tailgating, picnics, or any outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband as a gift - we spend lots of time at our son's baseball games, and he's been looking for a small, portable gas grill so we could tailgate. This grill is perfect. It's easy to pack, easy to set up, and easy to clean. Heats evenly and cooks well. He liked it so much, we bought one for his brother as a birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed, was really looking forward to having a small
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Unable to attach feet to bottom as one of the holes for a screw was not drilled through. The latch does not hold. Very difficult to re-insert the drip pan. So disappointed, was really looking forward to having a small, portable grill for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy but alright for the prize
customer_reviews.text: I got the black version with no push button igniter. No big deal since it was cheaper that way. The grill was a little tricky to get the legs in correct position, mainly because I was in a hurry when I put it together. The grilling surface is enamel and very thin, you can't really expect much for this prize range. Beware, do not use metal utensils. Only plastic so not to scratch the enamel off. It is also a little tricky to seat the grill cover when taking it down. The tolerances are not there but all in all for the low prize it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Ahlstedt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Works better than our multi-burner gas grill at home!! 15 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Used this every day on our camping trip in the mountains of Colorado! Tastes like a charcoal grill and better than our large multi-burner gas grill at home! Excellent buy a will make fantastic Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: SWTXRose

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible, cheaply manufactured product way below even my cheap expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible, cheaply manufactured product way below even my cheap expectations. The lid latch doesn’t work if the grill plate is on. The grill plate doesn’t sit uniformly on the drip pan/reflector pan. The drip pan/reflector plate doesn’t fit over the walls of the base unless you pinch in the sides. If you do happen to force it to fit and you close the lid, that doesn’t close all the way, the drip pan becomes unseated again. I didn’t even bother to hook up the regulator. Since it seems to me the grill isn’t ‘defective’ it’s poorly designed I boxed it back up and sending it back for a refund. This is a disappointing poorly manufactured product Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeOre

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with this unit
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this unit. Set up and usage is easy, cleaning is not to bad as the drip pan can be removed and soaked along with the grill. The painted surfaces are easy to wipe and no special chemicals were used. The unit is light and easy to move around and is quite compact. I was able to comfortably grill 6 pcs of chicken in one go and another time, 4 steaks making it perfect for catering for 2-4 persons when doing a meal. The unit seems quite durable once it is not mishandled or abused.
customer_reviews.author: O. K. Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Burns everything
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. Stuck with this style because we bought the griddle and case. Control stopped working on the first one. It is impossible to set flame low enough, everything burns on outside while uncooked on inside. Not easy to clean. Opening the lid sends the unit tumbling backward unless you have weight on the grill. Best thing about it, small and portable. We will discard this one and start over with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Prohaska

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking, with some annoying issues
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my camping kitchen this summer and I've really been enjoying it. I've enjoying making skewers, pancakes, etc. I will say, though, Coleman should be absolutely embarrassed by the quality of the hinges and latches on this thing. I can't even believe this is a Coleman product. Broken, loose and wonky parts. They don't affect the actual cooking, thankfully. It's annoying when storing and carrying, latch fails and it falls open.
customer_reviews.author: HappiestCamper

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Compact.
customer_reviews.text: Nice grille. I like that there is interchangeable tops for this. I have the griddle as well. I like to cook breakfast on the griddle and dinner on the grille when camping. My only complaint is that it cooks hot even on low. I chop it up to its size. I wanted something compact and when its compact the flame is going to be a lot closer to the grille so I cant complain too much. I like the carrying bag (purchased seperate) because you can fit a ton of stuff in it. I fit the grille, griddle, grille brush, and cooking utensils plus the propane bottles in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Useless Screws!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of the grill. Taking the propane tanks on and off are a breeze and it cooks wonderfully. I gave it three stars because after the third time I used it, all four legs have come off. The tiny screws that come with this grill are useless. The only reason I have not returned it is I threw the boxes away. I ordered the bag and griddle as well. Coleman, I expected better quality from you!!😔
customer_reviews.author: Karen Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill for my camper van because of its small compact size ..At first I wasn’t sure I would like this small grill . But after using it several times I am very impressed.. It gets very hot , burgers & chicken cooked perfectly and were delicious. Clean up easy ..having a tiny sink in my RV with little room for clean up , I just put a few wet paper towels over the grate , let sit and it cleaned up nicely. After I returned home I gave it a really good cleaning and it almost looked new .. I highly recommend this grill , especially if you’re limited on space . You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian W.

customer_reviews.title: fold-n-go-no-go
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I used the grill the ceramic flaked off the grill very cheap.I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: paul woerle

customer_reviews.title: Stack of sheet metal that doesn't fit together.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the construction of this. Mine will not close and latch. The design and materials used are not to the quality level I expected from Coleman. I will use it, but I will be very wary about buying Colman products now that they are of the same poor quality as some of the low-cost competitors. I would give it a 1 star, but I haven't used it yet. We will see. I have only unpacked it from the box and set in my RV for my upcoming camping trip. Right now it is just a pile of sheet metal that doesn't really fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Steaming Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping, this one is junk
customer_reviews.text: We needed a little grill to have in our little RV. For a Coleman, it is very cheaply made. The cover bent after the first use. Now the lid won't close properly. It barely puts out a flame, oh, and even though the picture shows the carrying case, that does not come with it. We used it because we had no time to get another one, so we're keeping it. But I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grill that works
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews say, it is difficult to get the grill to close and latch properly. Seems to be a little cheaply made but sturdy enough to last for a few years at least. It works well and is easy to light. I'd say it's worth it if you're looking for a small portable grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Berrier

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great size
customer_reviews.text: Good price, great size. I agree the edges of the drip tray did cut me while cleaning and the latch is flimsy, but for the price, cooking ability and size, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy piece of junk. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I took this stove on one camping trip and the flimsy body warped, probably from the heat, so the drip pan no longer fit on it rendering the product useless. Also there is no place to light the unit unless you remove the grill which is a complete hassle if the burner needs to be relit. When the unit is closed, the grill is not firmly held in place so it bounces all around knocking dents into the unit from the inside. Absolutely the worst design possible and one of the worst products I have ever bought on Amazon! Coleman is going downhill fast!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hilborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for BBQin on the water, After a while on my fishing trips got tired of sandwiches and cold foods. Found this great small portable grill that fits easy in my storage compartments on my bass boat. Grills everything from hot dogs to carne asada! Too good! Over all pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jnca

customer_reviews.title: It fits our need
customer_reviews.text: The size fits well with our class B camper. Made a nice cover and added some padding to keep quiet while traveling. Hooked it up so it would feed from propane tank on RV eliminating carrying propane bottles. Size also makes clean up easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tidynan

customer_reviews.title: Regulator is supposed to lock into side of grill with ...
customer_reviews.text: Regulator is supposed to lock into side of grill with a spring clip that is inside grill. Very sloppy fit and doesn't really lock in at all which makes me think there is potential for gas leak. Not sure why they don't use screw in type attachment. Called Coleman and customer service person had no clue and suggested I return it.
customer_reviews.author: jayballer

customer_reviews.title: Super chief
customer_reviews.text: Own 2 of these and have all attachments. Cooks steaks perfect every time !
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Surprise result.
customer_reviews.text: It might just be us, but heating it up on high, then cooking, and letting it burn for a couple minutes after steaks removed, it got hot enough to melt the plastic handle. With no way to open the grill it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: D G Lee

customer_reviews.title: Eh it’s a grill
customer_reviews.text: It’s an easy small grill. But it doesn’t latch well to transport. Hard to tell if it’s lit but that’s the design of the burner. It does cook well. I have the larger version of this grill and it has the same issues mostly the burner style. But it is easy to clean. We will see if it holds up
customer_reviews.author: great for school notes on all my things phone tablet computer.  I can jot notes down fast and there saved love

customer_reviews.title: Regulator does not push in far enough to cover the open slot on the Orifice
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll need to return unless someone can provide advice. After pushing the regulator into the grill, it doesn't seem to go in far enough as the Orfice slot is still open. (see photo 2) When I turned the fuel on, the burner did not light; however I could smell the propane. The fuel goes out of the Orfice and not thru the fuel tube to the burner opening. (see photo 1). I found this out by lighting the BBQ before I removed the cooking surface and the cooktop to see what was wrong. Help! Or I will need to return. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. A friend owns an RV and travels ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. A friend owns an RV and travels everywhere. This is the go to grill. You buy a Walmart square frying pan that fits across the grill face and you can grill or cook other things like pancakes. It uses less gas than the big grill. Breaks down and is very portable for campers. Cooks a great steak too.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great size for RV / Camping.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take in the RV--needed something small and table-top. Works well, but as others have stated, it is a bit flimsy and difficult to clean. But it does that job I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size portable grill for the deck of the boat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size portable grill for the deck of the boat. Stores in very compact spaces and is very light. The family loves being able to grill up lunch without having to go back to the shore or cut short our time out. We just pull into a cove, grab some cold beverages and grab a bite to eat. In no time we are back enjoying our summer days once again thanks to this grill. Fits 3 burgers comfortably or lots of hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Put a sheet of aluminum foil over the grill surface ...
customer_reviews.text: Put a sheet of aluminum foil over the grill surface and it cooks a couple trout to perfection in 8-9 minutes without making it hard to clean the grill while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Normal

customer_reviews.title: This option was perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This option was perfect for our needs. I would say you can squeeze 5 burgers on there and it gets plenty hot enough. We also did steak and both came out great. My one problem was that the nonstick surface isn't exactly non stick at all, it can be difficult to clean but otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: used it over a 4 day weekend in the hot desert and it worked great..
customer_reviews.text: great little grill i keep on the boat. used it at Lake mead on a 4 day weekend and it traveled great and worked great on the boat.. just wish the travel case came with it..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great portable grill.
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. Very portable, easy to clean and cooks up meat very quickly and efficiently. Just fold it up and put it in the carrying case and off you go. Much sturdier than other portable grills I've used before and very easy to put together, just attach the feet to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: It gets pretty hot
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for the price, I thought it would be a little more heavy duty, but it serves the purpose for our RV, it’s small and for two people is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Packs up nice and small for the RV
customer_reviews.text: Packs up nice and small for the RV. It is a tad flimsy but go easy and you should get a few years use from it. Cook temps are fine for our needs with burgess, dogs and shish kabobs. Cleaning can have it's challenges. A large brash brush gets off the majority of the grime, once well preheated. Spritz the grill with some olive oil, to help stop the sticking.
customer_reviews.author: stevog

customer_reviews.title: Compact unit
customer_reviews.text: I have downsized to a van camper and this smaller unit just fits the bill for outside grilling. It cooks evenly and quickly while only taking a small storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Housdoctor

customer_reviews.title: Like this one!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for use with our camping trailer. It sets up easily and cleans quickly. We like it. Don't think I would get it if I had a bunch of kids though, because it isn't that large for 5-6 burgers at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Inner grease tray extremely sharp on the edges!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill, we carry it in our campervan, love the compact size and the way it works like a large grill. However the inner grease tray is extremely sharp on the edges! That's why I gave it only 3 stars. I cut myself cleaning it! will have to work the edges of this part to make it safe. Coleman needs to pay attention, someone is going to get hurt bad as I see this has been a problem for other users as well. Ray
customer_reviews.author: Ray W.

customer_reviews.title: It isnt perfect but it works
customer_reviews.text: This little grill awesome worked almost perfect, I say almost because the wind did blow it out once but for the price and compactness you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge N.

customer_reviews.title: After reading the reviews, I decided to spend a ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to spend a little more and buy this compact grill. I’m not impressed. We’ve had trouble with the latch that holds the lid shut. Can’t get it open, then it wants to come open and dump everything when I’m carrying it. I wish I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: TKL

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cheap*.
customer_reviews.text: Is typical of newer Coleman products: a cheap, poorly made piece of *. Does not close well or once you struggle with the latch it readily opens. Grill does not stay in place when moving it and rattles around. I will use it and report more later.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: Not an INSTASTART
customer_reviews.text: This is not the instastart model, you have to use a match or quick click lighter to light the burner on this model. In my opinion half the time those buttons don't work and make me nervous anyway so I was fine to save over $25.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Martel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Transport
customer_reviews.text: Takes up little room in our RV storage compartment and just the right size for two. I must use PAM; otherwise, the meat sticks to the grill. The locking mechanisms doesn’t work so I use a bungee cord to keep it closed when stored. I like the small size plus it’s easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Small size is great
customer_reviews.text: The small size is great for camping/traveling, and storage. Works good to cook food for 2-3 people. It breaks down well for easy cleaning. It does run hot, so I wouldn’t recommend cooking anything on high. I have found medium is plenty for cooking, maybe medium high if I want a quick sear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We have been going through small grills rather quickly. But this one is sturdy and durable. We love the size and we cook for just two of us so it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife Up Close

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: flimsy piece of junk. didn't even use it. once we opened it up and saw the poor quality we boxed it right back up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Quality grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice small grill and I also got the griddle, grill, and grate to use as a burner. Have not used it enough to really test it but the few times I have it worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill. I had purchased another portable grill at 4x the price, returned it and purchased this one. Works 100% better than the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very small and easy to travel with I just wish it came with a travel bag. Get ready to tailgate, BBQ in the go and so on.
customer_reviews.author: fourtoneys

customer_reviews.title: portable with flaws
customer_reviews.text: it's nice and portable. It's small but can cook more than expected. But it's hard to get the fire lit (especially if it's bright outside), and everything you cook will stick to the griddle, so make sure to grease a lot before cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Min sanity

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill. only cooked on it once so far but cooked 2 14oz ribeyes to perfection with no problem as fast as our 40,000btu grill at home. Got it at Amazon on sale for $39.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grill!! Can handle 3-4 large burgers at a time. Its easy to clean and takes up little room. Wish I would have bought it sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: not easy to clean in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: not easy to clean in my opinion (maybe easy to some people though) ...... beyond that, it's pretty awesome
customer_reviews.author: nezbir troffol

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The edges of the grill are very sharp. It cut my fingers a couple of times when I was cleaning it. It should be recalled in my opinion. I would return it if I still could. It is a poor quality, junky product. It doesn’t worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is not the same item as pictured. In the picture, this item has igniter and the regulator assembly is threaded but the I received don't have those. I think Amazon really need to fix the pictures so it won't create confusions.
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Small and light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack and clean; I have a larger tail-gater grill, but it's too heavy and bulky for just me and my wife to go camping. This one was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: Heats in spots rather than evenly all over. Lots of effort to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Donnaj

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased as a gift to my dad who ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift to my dad who is single and on his own. It's just the right size for him to cook for himself without paying hundreds for a larger grill!
customer_reviews.author: T Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack.  Easy to Use.  Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is so easy to use and clean. Works great. Cooks food easily. Would definitely recommend for car campers! Compact and easy to pack too.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Small, light and easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the total joke of a lock that we had read about in other reviews, we are quite happy with it - perfect size for the two of us. We do wish it had a push button start
customer_reviews.author: Bogey

customer_reviews.title: not a fan of this. cheaply made, the ...
customer_reviews.text: not a fan of this.cheaply made, the closing clasp doesn't work well. doesn't get very hot. That said... if you are patient... it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Couch

customer_reviews.title: Best camping grill!!
customer_reviews.text: This little grill is amazing! We bought it to use camping, but we are also using it at home. Easy clean up. We bought the cover for it also. It holds two canisters and protects the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Fold n Go Grill doesn’t light.
customer_reviews.text: Well, thought this would be a better grill. Everything put together correctly. Connected the propane canister and snapped in the attachment. Would not light. Tried two canisters with plenty of propane in them. I can smell the propane, but it will not light. Tried many times and nothing. Sad, but back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Grill
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, great grilling results and easy to clean. I bought the carrying case. That makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rbison

customer_reviews.title: Good, but has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a good grill for traveling and camping for two /four people. This grill does need a lighter or match to to light gas. My issue with this grill was when cleaning the drip tray my husband cut himself badly, it is Very sharp around the edges . Be very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C.

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this is exactly what I was looking for. Wanted something easy to use and is discreet to use down the Jersey shore where BBQing isn’t exactly following the rules. Cooks really well, used it three times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is perfect for our needs, compact enough to fit in limited spaces yet there's plenty of space to grill 2 steaks or 4 burgers etc.....the only thing bad I can say is the latch leaves a lot to be desired, small problem for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: indy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weekend camping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weekend camping. Small and highly portable. But still easily holds plenty of food to feed about four folks. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I replaced my older one (10yrs old) when the burner stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Rich6973

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good and I mean good compact grill you found it only if I was to do it over I would get the one with the ignitor on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and compact
customer_reviews.text: Took it tailgating. Did everything I needed and took up little space. Cooked 4 burgers at once, and two large Rib-eyes later.....perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give a better review...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a better review but the grill won't stay lit on low. It's high or nothing with this grill. I will be attempting to return it
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Handy small grill
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this this grill! Best for travel and stores in small space!
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses for duck hunting trips. Cook sausage for breakfast. Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K_S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my apartment and small balcony!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my apartment and small balcony! My apartment complex doesn't allow charcoal grills, so this was a great alternative! Not too small and doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Workman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS Grill... I also ordered the bag. Perfect just perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It may seem a little flimsy but once the drip pan is in, its quite solid. Grills very very well, hardly uses any propane. Perfect for Florida tailgating and hurricane season!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Grill is portable, easy to carry, and cooks really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Nice small Grill.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size great for camping when space and weight is limited. I've only used it a few times and never had a problem. I use non stick cooking spray 1st with medium heat, cooks perfect and easy to clean. Thank you Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect... I love this grill, Easy to use, and Cooked our shish kabobs perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We really like this propane grill. Four hamburger patties or two good sized new york strip steaks fit comfortably on it. It stows easy in the bag we purchased separately. We line the bottom drip pan with foil to make clean up less of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Colorista

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all the traveling I do for work. Only improvement it could have would be a push button igniter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Egan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 minutes just to get the drip tray pan to fit in place. The hold close latch lever is tiny and doesn't grab properly. Poor quality. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great the only issue is the lock is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ibach

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. Only problem is cleaning is a pain in the butt
customer_reviews.author: lulubelle

customer_reviews.title: Coleman grill
customer_reviews.text: We have picnics on our decks. Wonderful grill for the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stars actually this is Junk
customer_reviews.text: Burner screw wasn't long enough to even reach through to mount the burner. Metal very thin. More chinese crap. Shame on you Coleman this is crap
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love this..
customer_reviews.text: If you got small meals you want to do outside this beats firing up a bill Barbecue grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camping grill ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact and light weight this grill is. Bought the carrying case to go with it and worth every penny. Easy to use, easy to clean = I don't have anything negative you say about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: I used it the day I got it. I live in an apartment and wanted something that I could bring inside and not have the smell of charcoal and this is great. It looks really sharp. Some reviews say it is made out of cheap metal but it is very strong metal. I was able to cook a decent size steak and also 6 average size burgers on it at the same time so it works out really good for a small family of four like we are but would be great for camping too. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bakken

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I put a retaining spring on the ...
customer_reviews.text: All in all, I really like it. I put a retaining spring on the latch so that it would stay closed when carrying around.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: You can't get any accessories such as the griddle or the stove grate for it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot accept you can't get the accessories for it such as the griddle or stove grate for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable grill!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill! My boyfriend and I took it around from park to park and even friends houses to grill this summer. Great quality and has power of a larger grill. Helps promote healthy eating!!! One tip wash after every use don't want that black buildup. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmila Lebed

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great stove for camping. Not for whole chicken but great for filets.
customer_reviews.author: camperbeast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best grill for camping and other outings. Easy clean up. Even heating.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Poortenga

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and stores in a compact space. It works great for our camp trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Carole M. Staat

customer_reviews.title: Goes together easily and suits mt camping needs
customer_reviews.text: It ok. The latch doesn't work very well so I keep it in a bag. Goes together easily and suits mt camping needs. Easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Grill
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this portable grill! It's perfect for two, easy to use, easy to clean, and easy to store. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: PolkaDot

product_meta.title: Coleman Fold N Go Propane Grill
feature_bullets: Portable folding grill with built-in handle for easy transport and storage
Delivers 6,000 BTUs of heat across 105 sq. in. of grilling surface
Adjustable horseshoe burner for precise temperature control and even heating
PerfectFlow technology ensures consistent performance even in extreme conditions
Removable dishwasher-safe cooking surface and grease tray for easy cleaning
